title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 800.17 - Period of certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 800.17 - Period of certification

State Regulations
(a) Expiration of initial certification. A candidate's initial certification shall
expire at 11:59 p.m. on the last day of the month 48 months following the month
in which the candidate passed the cognitive certification
examination. (b) Expiration of
subsequent certifications. (1)
A candidate
who completes the requirements of section
800.8
of this Part during the last
nine months of his or her certification shall have his or her certification
extended for an additional 48 months; (2)

The certification of a candidate who
completes the requirements of section
800.8
of this Part at any other
time while certified shall expire at 11:59 p.m. on the last day of the month 48
months following the month in which the candidate passed the cognitive
certification examination. (3)

The
certification of a candidate who recertifies pursuant to section
800.18
of this Part shall expire
at 11:59 p.m. on the last day of the month 48 months following the month in
which the candidate passes the cognitive certification examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
800.17

Amended

New

York State Register June 5, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 23, eff. 6/5/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
